name: Be Kind (shakirus)
description:
My first gamejam experience!  

The theme for the gamejam is: Rewind

The story for this is you are working BB Video and you have to find the tapes scattered about and put them into the TV/VCR sets to play them.  Some tapes need to be rewound first though!  

I would love to hear feedback as this was my first time building a complete game from beginning to end along with all the sound, art, etc.. that is important for a complete game.
